snippet: A former confidant of New Jersey Governor Chris Christie will be sentenced on Monday for pressuring United Airlines into operating a flight to an airport near his vacation home, a case that grew out of the "Bridgegate" investigation....

headline.main: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments
headline.print_headline: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments

lead_paragraph: A former confidant of New Jersey Governor Chris Christie will be sentenced on Monday for pressuring United Airlines into operating a flight to an airport near his vacation home, a case that grew out of the "Bridgegate" investigation.
